dependencies.name: py-certifi
dependencies.description:
Certifi: A carefully curated collection of Root Certificates for
validating the trustworthiness of SSL certificates while verifying the
identity of TLS hosts.

dependencies.name: py-cryptography
dependencies.description:
cryptography is a package which provides cryptographic recipes and
primitives to Python developers

dependencies.name: py-idna
dependencies.description: Internationalized Domain Names for Python (IDNA 2008 and UTS #46)

dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-pyopenssl
dependencies.description:
High-level wrapper around a subset of the OpenSSL library. Note: The
Python Cryptographic Authority strongly suggests the use of
pyca/cryptography where possible. If you are using pyOpenSSL for
anything other than making a TLS connection you should move to
cryptography and drop your pyOpenSSL dependency.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-urllib3-secure-extra
dependencies.description:
Marker library to detect whether urllib3 was installed with the
deprecated [secure] extra

dependencies.name: python-venv
dependencies.description: A Spack managed Python virtual environment

dependent_to.name: py-lightning
dependent_to.description: The deep learning framework to pretrain, finetune and deploy AI models.

dependent_to.description: A Snakemake storage plugin for S3 API storage (AWS S3, MinIO, etc.).

dependent_to.name: py-elasticsearch
dependent_to.description: Python client for Elasticsearch

dependent_to.name: py-kaggle
dependent_to.description:
Official API for https://www.kaggle.com, accessible using a command line
tool implemented in Python. Beta release - Kaggle reserves the right to
modify the API functionality currently offered.

dependent_to.name: py-selenium
dependent_to.description:
Python language bindings for Selenium WebDriver. The selenium package is
used to automate web browser interaction from Python.

dependent_to.name: py-pygithub
dependent_to.description: Typed interactions with the GitHub API v3

dependent_to.name: py-torchdata
dependent_to.description: Composable data loading modules for PyTorch.

dependent_to.name: py-ogb
dependent_to.description:
The Open Graph Benchmark (OGB) is a collection of benchmark datasets,
data loaders, and evaluators for graph machine learning. Datasets cover
a variety of graph machine learning tasks and real-world applications.
The OGB data loaders are fully compatible with popular graph deep
learning frameworks, including PyTorch Geometric and Deep Graph Library
(DGL). They provide automatic dataset downloading, standardized dataset
splits, and unified performance evaluation.

dependent_to.name: py-google-auth
dependent_to.description:
This library simplifies using Google's various server-to-server
authentication mechanisms to access Google APIs.

dependent_to.name: py-conan
dependent_to.description: Conan C/C++ package manager

dependent_to.name: py-requests
dependent_to.description: Python HTTP for Humans.

dependent_to.name: py-lightning-cloud
dependent_to.description: Lightning AI Command Line Interface.

dependent_to.name: openturns
dependent_to.description:
OpenTURNS is a scientific C++ and Python library featuring an internal
data model and algorithms dedicated to the treatment of uncertainties.
The main goal of this library is to provide all functionalities needed
to treat uncertainties in studies with industrial applications. Targeted
users are all engineers who want to introduce the probabilistic
dimension in their so far deterministic studies.

dependent_to.name: py-neptune-client
dependent_to.description:
Flexible metadata store for MLOps, built for research and production
teams that run a lot of experiments.

dependent_to.name: py-httpx
dependent_to.description:
HTTPX is a fully featured HTTP client for Python 3, which provides sync
and async APIs, and support for both HTTP/1.1 and HTTP/2.

dependent_to.name: py-azure-cli
dependent_to.description: Microsoft Azure Command-Line Tools.

dependent_to.name: awscli-v2
dependent_to.description:
This package provides a unified command line interface to Amazon Web
Services.

dependent_to.name: py-requests-unixsocket
dependent_to.description: Use requests to talk HTTP via a UNIX domain socket.

dependent_to.name: py-strawberryfields
dependent_to.description: Open source library for continuous-variable quantum computation

dependent_to.name: py-sentry-sdk
dependent_to.description: The new Python SDK for Sentry.io

dependent_to.name: py-htgettoken

htgettoken gets OIDC authentication tokens for High Throughput Computing
via a Hashicorp vault server.

dependent_to.name: py-vcrpy

Automatically mock your HTTP interactions to simplify and speed up
testing.

dependent_to.name: py-responses

dependent_to.name: py-botocore

dependent_to.name: py-minio

MinIO Python SDK is Simple Storage Service (aka S3) client to perform

dependent_to.name: nsimd
dependent_to.description:
NSIMD is a vectorization library that abstracts SIMD programming. It was
designed to exploit the maximum power of processors at a low development
cost.

dependent_to.name: py-sanic
dependent_to.description:
Sanic is a Flask-like Python 3.5+ web server that is written to go fast.
It is based on the work done by the amazing folks at magicstack

simulators at IBM

A persistent HTTP cache that provides an easy way to get better
performance with the python requests library.

dependent_to.name: py-lightly

dependent_to.name: py-dulwich

Dulwich aims to provide an interface to Git repos (both local and
